questions.question: What is ¬∀x P(x) equivalent to?
questions.explanation: Negation of universal is existential negation.

questions.question: What is ¬∃x P(x) equivalent to?
questions.explanation: Negation of existential is universal negation.

questions.question: What are quantifiers placed one after another called?
questions.explanation: Nested quantifiers layer on each other.
